updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with and x-c-os-family field
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with and x-c-os-family field
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. Configured a new client configuration
4. Collect transaction events
5. Compared with expected results
6. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.custom_steps:

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-malware-policy field
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-malware-policy field
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. Setting TSS profile, Multiple TSS Profiles
4. Download/Upload a File which fit the TSS policy
5. Collect transaction events
6. Compared with expected results
7. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-result field and scanning malicious file
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5

4. Collect transaction events

6. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-result field and timeout file
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-result field and timeout file
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)

3. Upload/download the file which takes more than thresh hold scan time
4. Collect transaction events
5. Compared with expected results
6. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-result field and Max size exceeded
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-tp-result field and Max size exceeded
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. TSS Scan result for Uploading/Downloading more file for than 16mb file
4. Collect transaction events
5. Compared with expected results
6. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-rs-file-sha256
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-rs-file-sha256
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. Login to tenant webUI
4. Under the Policies, Click On Threat Protection
5. Add or update exisiting SHA256 hash list with the global blacklist hash value
6. Upload the same file to the saas app
7. Collect transaction events
8. Compared with expected results
9. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication
